publ: by 深圳市第一构想科技有限公司
name: COOAUCam
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
COOAU Cam skill can only work with certain AC powered Wi-Fi cameras, not all cameras using COOAU CamAPP can use COOAU Cam skill, please consult the sellers if your product can support Alexa before using this skill.

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Install COOAU Cam App from App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to COOAU Cam App, keep it online and running.
2. Find COOAU Cam Skill in Alexa App, click "Enable Skill" to link your camera with the Alexa account, then find your camera.
3. Try voice commands like "Alexa, show the living room" to get live videos and check everything's fine in your sweet home.
